question: What is RocketQuest?
answer: RocketQuest is our employee-gamification platform—complete quests, earn points & badges, and climb the leaderboard!

question: How do I earn XP?
answer: You earn XP by completing quests. Each quest’s reward shows how much XP it gives.

question: How do I earn points?
answer: Points are also earned by finishing quests or tasks. Points help you level up and rank higher on the leaderboard.

question: What are badges?
answer: Badges are visual achievements you unlock when you hit XP, task, or point milestones.

question: How can I see the leaderboard?
answer: Go to the “Leaderboard” page to see users ranked by points, tasks completed, and level.

question: How do I start a quest?
answer: On the “Quests” page, click “Start” on any active quest. You’ll then see its progress bar appear.

question: What happens when a quest is in progress?
answer: You get a countdown bar showing days/hours left until the quest’s due date.

question: How do I create a new task?
answer: Managers and Admins can click “+ Add Task” on the Tasks page, fill in title, description, assignee, deadline—and save!

question: Who can delete or edit a task?
answer: Only the user’s role = Admin or Manager. Employees can only update their own task status to In Progress or In Verification.

question: What are Teams for?
answer: Teams let you group employees under a Manager, assign shared quests, view member schedules, and collaborate on group challenges.

question: How do I join a Team?
answer: On the Teams page, click “Request Join” next to the team you want. Your manager or an Admin must then approve your request.

question: How do I remove someone from my Team?
answer: Team Managers can submit a Remove Request. Admins can approve and actually remove a member from a team.

question: Can I see my teammates’ progress?
answer: On the Quests page, you’ll see only your own progress. For team-wide quests, teammates’ status is visible under the Team Dashboard.

question: How are group quests different?
answer: Group (team) quests require multiple members to each complete a subtask. Rewards are shared or split according to participation.

question: Who can assign shifts?
answer: Only users with the Admin or Manager role can assign, move, or swap shifts on the Work-Schedule grid.

question: How do I view my profile stats?
answer: Your profile shows total XP, points, level, badges, and tasks completed; accessible via the top-nav “Profile” link.

question: Who do I contact for help?
answer: If you’re stuck, reach out to your Team Manager or email support@rocketquest.example.com.
